home._description: I am a software engineer with a passion for building web applications. I have solid experience in React and TypeScript, and I love to learn new things.

projects._description: Here are some of my most recent projects. Feel free to explore them!

toolkit_ddj._description: Developed during an academic extension at Open Knowledge Brasil. It's a collaborative database of over 145 tools for working with data.

bandejaobot._description: Twitter and Bluesky bot that posts the UFRJ cafeterias' menu every day at 9 a.m.

calculaeco._description: GPA calculation tool for the School of Communication at UFRJ.
